pl.wiraszka.ZwirekSpaceInvaders

Class VisualBattlefield

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.wiraszka.ZwirekSpaceInvaders.VisualBattlefield
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Commons

    public class VisualBattlefield
extends Object
implements Commons

    VisualBattlefield in Zwirek Space Invaders

    Represents structure of battlefield visable to user. Is created in Model and sent to View to propre display it to user.
    Author:
    Maciej Wiraszka

    • Field Detail

      • imageName

        public String[][] imageName
        Table holding names of pictures to be shown on the battlefield. Names of pictures and battlefield size according to interface Commons.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VisualBattlefield

        public VisualBattlefield(Player player,
                         ArrayList<Alien> aliens,
                         ArrayList<Shot> alienShots,
                         ArrayList<Shot> playerShots)
        Constructor that holds whole process of creating VisualBattlefield
        • Create empty imageName table with battlefield size according to interface Commons
        • Insert player, aliens and shots names of images in proper order.
        Parameters:
        player - to display
        aliens - array holding aliens to display
        alienShots - array holding alien shots to display
        playerShots - array holding player shots to display
